Opening hours:
Monday to Thursday, 8.00am to 12.30pm and 1.15pm to 4.30pm
Friday: 8.00am to 12.30pm
details.access_and_opening_times:
Making a consular appointment

Our High Commissions, Embassies and Consulates offices deal with a large number of urgent cases each year. Before contacting our offices with non-urgent enquiries, please read our Support for British nationals abroad: a guide to see if the information you need is there. If you still cannot find the information you need, you can contact your nearest Consular team. Please contact the Consular Section to make an appointment for this service.

Disabled access

The Foreign & Commonwealth Office and the British High Commission in Malaysia are keen to ensure that their buildings and services are fully accessible to disabled members of the public. Wherever possible, we have made our buildings and services accessible. Sometimes, however, this is not possible due to security or other restrictions. In these situations we will endeavor to provide a service or access to a building in an alternative way to ensure equality of access for disabled people. To assist disabled staff and visitors, we have set out below details of disabled access at the High Commission. We hope this information is helpful.

General Physical Access If you anticipate requiring assistance, please telephone us in advance of your visit so that we can ensure that we are able to provide access for you (Tel: 2170 2200 and ask for the Security Manager).

Access for Visually Impaired Visitors

  • Signs: generally clear and easy to read. Floor designation inside the lift is in Braille.

  • Guide dogs: guide dogs are welcome. They must however pass through the guardhouse for the usual security check.

Emergency/Evacuation: procedures are in place to assist disabled persons in the event of emergency/evacuation.

Public holidays

The office will be closed on the following days in the calendar year for 2016:

  • Friday 1 January - New Year’s Day

  • Monday 8 February - Chinese New Year

  • Tuesday 9 February - Chinese New Year

  • Friday 25 March - Good Friday*

  • Monday 28 March - Easter Monday*

  • Wednesday 6 July - Hari Raya Puasa

  • Thursday 7 July - Hari Raya Puasa

  • Wednesday 31 August - Merdeka Day

  • Friday 16 September - Malaysia Day

  • Monday 12 September - Hari Raya Haji

  • Friday 28 October - Deepavali (in lieu of Saturday 29 October)

  • Monday 26 December - Christmas Day (in lieu of Sunday 25 December)

  • Tuesday 27 December - Boxing Day* (in lieu of Monday 26 December)

Holidays marked * are UK Public and Privilege Holiday

To contact the High Commission when we are closed call +603-2170 2200
